name: bookish-press
description: A platform for reading and writing readable, accessible, beautiful online books.

scripts.//dev: echo 'Run the Svelte/Vite local server to test locally. Use in combination with run emu to run locally.'
scripts.//emu: echo 'This copies the local .env file and starts the emulator'
scripts.emu: firebase use dev && npm run env && firebase emulators:start
scripts.//env: echo 'This copies the .env file corresponding to the current Firebase project specified with firebase use, defaulting to local'
scripts.//stage: echo 'switch to the dev project, deploy, relying on Firebase's predeploy hook to run the build script above before release'
scripts.//release: echo 'switch to the prod project, deploy, relying on Firebase's predeploy hook to run the build script above before release'
scripts.//merge: merge dev into main, push to remote
scripts.merge: git checkout main && git merge dev && git push origin main && git checkout dev
